title: Yamaha XJR XJR 1200 R '98
description: 20,000 km - always stored in a private garage - covered at all times. - Multi-adjustable OHLINS front-end suspensions (adjustable spring absorption and pressure reduction front & rear) - BREMBO front callipers - Alarm - Mini jelly protection ''mushrooms'' - Luggage rack - New tires - Optimally serviced - there is a service booked with every single detail! - 535 chain (unique trait) - Front tire 130/70-17 - Low profile sport seat - A unique and almost custom (it's not thought) made motorcycle - Display and operation - exactly like new (i'd say better) - Less -
